summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing a gant agreement with the State of Washington Department of Trade and Economic Development (DTED) for grant assistance in support of the Department of Parks and Recreation for an in-plant process assessment of the Woodland Park Zoo's composting program; increasing the expenditure allowances in the Department's 1995 Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park Fund therefor, all by a three-fourth vote of the City Council.
